Title: Requires comprehensive Medicaid coverage for the treatment of obesity
Summary: Requires Medicaid to provide comprehensive coverage for the treatment of obesity including coverage for intensive behavioral therapy, bariatric surgery, and FDA-approved anti-obesity medication.
LawCode: Amd ยง365-a, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to expanding Medicaid coverage to include comprehensive coverage for the treatment of obesity
